sections.text: aqgnirna#H pAtuq kRutti#kAH | nakSha#traM dEqvami#ndriqyam | iqdamA#sAM ~MvicakShaqNam | haqvirAqsaM ju#hOtana || yasyaq BAnti# raqSmayOq yasya# kEqtava#H | yasyEqmA viSvAq Buva#nAniq sarvA$ | sa kRutti#kABiraqBi saqm~MvasA#naH | aqgnirnO# dEqvaH su#viqtE da#dhAtu || praqjApa#tE rOhiqNI vE#tuq patnI$ | viqSvarU#pA bRuhaqtI ciqtraBA#nuH | 1 (10)

sA nO# yaqj~jasya# suviqtE da#dhAtu | yathAq jIvE#ma SaqradaqH savI#rAH || rOqhiqNI dEqvyuda#gAt puqrastA$t | viSvA# rUqpANi# pratiqmOda#mAnA | praqjApa#ti(gm) haqviShA# vaqrddhaya#ntI | priqyA dEqvAnAq-mupa#yAtu yaqj~jam || sOmOq rAjA# mRugaSIqraq.ShENaq Agann# | SiqvaM nakSha#traM priqyama#syaq dhAma# | AqpyAya#mAnO bahuqqdhA janE#Shu | rEta#H praqjAM ~Myaja#mAnE dadhAtu || 2 (10)

yat tEq nakSha#traM mRugaSIqqraq.Shamasti# | priqya(gm) rA#jan priqyata#maM priqyANA$m | tasmai# tE sOma haqviShA# vidhEma | Sanna# Edhi dviqpadEq SaM catu#ShpadE || AqrdrayA# ruqdraH pratha#mAna Eti | SrEShThO# dEqvAnAqM pati#raGniqyAnA$m | nakSha#tramasya haqviShA# vidhEma | mA na#H praqjA(gm) rI#riShaqn mOta vIqrAn || hEqtI ruqdrasyaq pari#NO vRuNaktu | AqrdrA nakSha#traM juShatA(gm) haqvirna#H | 3 (10)

praqmuq~jcamA#nau duriqtAniq viSvA$ | apAqGaSa(gm)# saM nudatAqmarA#tim || puna#rnO dEqvyadi#tiH spRuNOtu | puna#rvasU naqH punaqrEtA$M ~Myaqj~jam | puna#rnO dEqvA aqBiya#ntuq sarvE$ | puna#H punarvO haqviShA# yajAmaH || EqvA na dEqvyadi#tiranaqrvA | viSva#sya BaqrtrI jaga#taH pratiqShThA | puna#rvasU haqviShA# vaqrddhaya#ntI | priqyaM dEqvAnAq-mapyE#tuq pAtha#H || 4 (10)

bRuhaqspati#H prathaqmaM jAya#mAnaH | tiqShya#M nakSha#tramaqBi saMba#BUva | SrEShThO# dEqvAnAqM pRuta#nAsu jiqShNuH | diSO&nuq sarvAq aBa#yannO astu || tiqShya#H puqrastA#duqta ma#ddhyaqtO na#H | bRuhaqspati# rnaqH pari#pAtu paqScAt | bAdhE#tAqn dvEShOq aBa#yaM kRuNutAm | suqvIrya#syaq pata#yaH syAma || iqda(gm) saqrpEByO# haqvira#stuq juShTa$m | AqSrEqShA yEShA#-manuqyantiq cEta#H | 5 (10)

yE aqntari#kShaM pRuthiqvIM kShiqyanti# | tEna#H saqrpAsOq havaqmAga#miShThAH || yE rO#caqnE sUryaqsyApi# saqrpAH | yE diva#M dEqvImanu# saq~jcara#nti | yEShA#mASrEqShA a#nuqyantiq kAma$m | tEBya#H saqrpEByOq madhu#majjuhOmi || upa#hUtAH piqtarOq yE maqGAsu# | manO#javasaH suqkRuta#H sukRuqtyAH | tE nOq nakSha#trEq havaqmAga#miShThAH | svaqdhABi# ryaqj~jaM praya#taM juShantAm || 6 (10)

yE a#gnidaqgdhA yE&na#gni-dagdhAH | yE#&muM ~MlOqkaM piqtara#H kShiqyanti# | yA(gg)Sca# viqdmayA(gm) u# caq na pra#viqdma | maqGAsu# yaqj~ja(gm) sukRu#taM juShantAm || gavAqM patiqH Palgu#nInAmasiq tvam | tada#ryaman varuNa mitraq cAru# | taM tvA# vaqya(gm) sa#niqtAra(gm)# sanIqnAm | jIqvA jIva#ntaqmupaq sam~Mvi#SEma || yEnEqmA viSvAq Buva#nAniq sa~jji#tA | yasya# dEqvA a#nu saqm~Myantiq cEta#H | 7 (10)

aqryaqmA rAjAq&jaraqstuvi#ShmAn | Palgu#nInA-mRuShaqBO rO#ravIti || SrEShThO# dEqvAnA$M BagavO BagAsi | tattvA# viduqH Palgu#nIqstasya# vittAt | aqsmaBya#M kShaqtramaqjara(gm)# suqvIrya$m | gOmaqdaSva#-vaqdupaq-sannu#dEqha || BagO# ha dAqtA Bagaq it pra#dAqtA | BagO# dEqvIH Palgu#nIqrAvi#vESa | BagaqsyEttaM pra#saqvaM ga#mEma | yatra# dEqvaiH sa#dhaqmAda#M madEma || 8 (10)

AyA#tu dEqvaH sa#viqtOpa#yAtu | hiqraqNyayE#na suqvRutAq rathE#na | vahaqnq. hasta(gm)# suqBaga#M vidmaqnApa#sam | praqyacCa#ntaqM papu#riqM puNyaqmacCa# || hastaqH praya#cCa tvaqmRutaqM ~MvasI#yaH | dakShi#NEnaq prati#gRuBNIma Enat | dAqtAra#maqdya sa#viqtA vi#dEya | yO nOq hastA#ya prasuqvAti# yaqj~jam || tvaShTAq nakSha#tramaqByE#ti ciqtrAm | suqBa(gm) sa#saM ~Myuvaqti(gm) rOca#mAnAm | 9 (10)

niqvEqSaya#-nnaqmRutAqn martyA(gg)#Sca | rUqpANi# piq(gm)qSan Buva#nAniq viSvA$ || tannaqstvaShTAq tadu# ciqtrA vica#ShTAm | tannakSha#traM BUriqdA a#stuq mahya$m | tanna#H praqjAM ~MvIqrava#tI(gm) sanOtu | gOBi#rnOq aSvaiqH sama#naktu yaqj~jam || vAqyurnakSha#tra-maqByE#tiq niShTyA$m | tiqgmaSRu#~ggO vRuShaqBO rOru#vANaH | saqmIqrayaqn Buva#nA mAtaqriSvA$ | apaq dvEShA(gm)#si nudatAqmarA#tIH || 10 (10)

tannO# vAqyastaduq niShTyA# SRuNOtu | tannakSha#traM BUriqdA a#stuq mahya$m | tannO# dEqvAsOq anu# jAnantuq kAma$m | yathAq tarE#ma duriqtAniq viSvA$ || dUqramaqsmacCatra#vO yantu BIqtAH | tadi#ndrAqgnI kRu#NutAqM tad viSA#KE | tannO# dEqvA anu#madantu yaqj~jam | paqScAt puqrastAq-daBa#yannO astu || nakSha#trANAq-madhi#patnIq viSA#KE | SrEShThA#vindrAqgnI Buva#nasya gOqpau | 11 (10)

viShU#caqH SatrU#-napaqbAdha#mAnau | apaq kShudha#M nudatAqmarA#tim || pUqrNA paqScAduqta pUqrNA puqrastA$t | unma#ddhyaqtaH pau$rNamAqsI ji#gAya | tasyA$M dEqvA adhi# saqm~Mvasa#ntaH | uqttaqmE nAka# iqha mA#dayantAm || pRuqthvI suqvarcA# yuvaqtiH saqjOShA$H | pauqrNaqmAqsyuda#gAq-cCOBa#mAnA | AqpyAqyaya#ntI duriqtAniq viSvA$ | uqruM duhAqM ~Myaja#mAnAya yaqj~jam ( ) || 12 (10) 3.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - yamanakShatrANAM yAjyAnuvAkyAH

RuqddhyAsma# haqvyair-nama#sOpaq sadya# | miqtraM dEqvaM mi#traqdhEya#nnO astu | aqnUqrAqdhAn. haqviShA# vaqrddhaya#ntaH | SaqtaM jI#vEma SaqradaqH savI#rAH || ciqtraM nakSha#traq-muda#gAt puqrastA$t | aqnUqrAqdhAsaq itiq yad vada#nti | tanmiqtra E#ti paqthiBi# rdEvaqyAnai$H | hiqraqNyayaiq rvita#tai-raqntari#kShE || indrO$ jyEqShThAmanuq nakSha#tramEti | yasmi#n vRuqtraM ~MvRu#traq tUryE# taqtAra# | 13 (10)

tasmi#n vaqyamaqmRutaqM duhA#nAH | kShudha#M tarEmaq duri#tiqM duri#ShTim || puqraqndaqrAya# vRuShaqBAya# dhRuqShNavE$ | aShA#DhAyaq saha#mAnAya mIqDhuShE$ | indrA#ya jyEqShThA madhu#maqd-duhA#nA | uqruM kRu#NOtuq yaja#mAnAya lOqkam || mUla#M praqjAM ~MvIqrava#tIM ~MvidEya | parA$cyEtuq nir.Ru#tiH parAqcA | gOBiq rnakSha#traM paqSuBiqH sama#ktam | aha#rBUyAqd-yaja#mAnAyaq mahya$m || 14 (10)

aha#rnO aqdya su#viqtE da#dhAtu | mUlaqM nakSha#traqmitiq yad vada#nti | parA#cIM ~MvAqcA nir.Ru#tiM nudAmi | SiqvaM praqjAyai# Siqvama#stuq mahya$m || yA diqvyA ApaqH paya#sA saM baBUqvuH | yA aqntari#kSha uqta pArthi#vIqryAH | yAsA#maShAqDhA a#nuqyantiq kAma$m | tA naq ApaqH Sa(gg) syOqnA Ba#vantu || yAScaq kUpyAq yASca# nAqdyA$H samuqdriyA$H | yASca# vaiSaqntIruqta prA#saqcIryAH | 15 (10)

yAsA#maShAqDhA madhu# BaqkShaya#nti | tA naq ApaqH Sa(gg) syOqnA Ba#vantu || tannOq viSvEq upa# SRuNvantu dEqvAH | tada#ShAqDhA aqBi sam~Mya#ntu yaqj~jam | tannakSha#traM prathatAM paqSuBya#H | kRuqShir vRuqShTir yaja#mAnAya kalpatAm || SuqBrAH kaqnyA# yuvaqtaya#H suqpESa#saH | kaqrmaqkRuta#H suqkRutO# vIqryA#vatIH | viSvA$n dEqvAn. haqviShA# vaqrddhaya#ntIH | aqShAqDhAH kAmaqmupa#yAntu yaqj~jam || 16 (10)

yasmiqn brahmAq&Byaja#yaqth sarva#mEqtat | aqmu~jca# lOqka miqdamU#caq sarva$m | tannOq nakSha#tramaBiqjid viqjitya# | Sriya#M dadhAq-tvahRu#NIyamAnam || uqBau lOqkau brahma#NAq sa~jji#tEqmau | tannOq nakSha#tramaBiqjid vica#ShTAm | tasmi#n vaqyaM pRuta#nAqH saM ja#yEma | tannO# dEqvAsOq anu#jAnantuq kAma$m || SRuqNvanti# SrOqNA-maqmRuta#sya gOqpAm | puNyA#masyAq upa#SRuNOmiq vAca$m | 17 (10)

maqhIM dEqvIM ~MviShNu#patnI-majUqryAm | praqtIcI#mEnA(gm) haqviShA# yajAmaH || trEqdhA viShNu#-rurugAqyO vica#kramE | maqhIM diva#M pRuthiqvI-maqntari#kSham | tacCrOqNaitiq Srava# iqcCamA#nA | puNyaq(gg)q SlOkaqM ~Myaja#mAnAya kRuNvaqtI || aqShTau dEqvA vasa#vaH sOqmyAsa#H | cata#srO dEqvI raqjarAqH Sravi#ShThAH | tE yaqj~jaM pA$ntuq raja#saH paqrastA$t | saqm~MvaqthsaqrINa#-maqmRuta(gg)# svaqsti || 18 (10)

yaqj~jaM na#H pAntuq vasa#vaH puqrastA$t | daqkShiqNaqtO#-&Biya#ntuq Sravi#ShThAH | puNyaqM nakSha#tramaqBi sam~Mvi#SAma | mA nOq arA#ti-raqGaSaq(gm)qsA gann# || kShaqtrasyaq rAjAq varu#NO&dhirAqjaH | nakSha#trANA(gm) SaqtaBi#Shaqg vasi#ShThaH | tau dEqvEBya#H kRuNutO dIqrGamAyu#H | Saqta(gm) saqhasrA# BEShaqjAni# dhattaH || yaqj~jannOq rAjAq varu#Naq upa#yAtu | tannOq viSvE# aqBi sam~Mya#ntu dEqvAH | 19(10)

tannOq nakSha#tra(gm) SaqtaBi#Shag juShAqNam | dIqrGamAyuqH prati#rad BEShaqjAni# || aqja Eka#pAqduda#gAt puqrastA$t | viSvA# BUqtAni# pratiqmOda#mAnaH | tasya# dEqvAH pra#saqvaM ~Mya#ntiq sarvE$ | prOqShThaqpaqdAsO# aqmRuta#sya gOqpAH || viqBrAja#mAnaH samidhAqna uqgraH | A&ntari#kSha-maruhaqda-gaqndyAm | ta(gm) sUrya#M dEqva-maqjamEka#pAdam | prOqShThaqpaqdAsOq anu#yantiq sarvE$ || 20 (10)

ahi#r buqddhniyaqH pratha#mAna Eti | SrEShThO# dEqvAnA#muqta mAnu#ShANAm | taM brA$hmaqNAH sO#maqpAH sOqmyAsa#H | prOqShThaqpaqdAsO# aqBi ra#kShantiq sarvE$ || caqtvAraq Eka#maqBi karma# dEqvAH | prOqShThaqpaqdAsaq itiq yAn. vada#nti | tE buqddhaniya#M pariqShadya(gg)# stuqvanta#H | ahi(gm)# rakShantiq nama#sOpaqsadya# || pUqShA rEqvatyanvE#tiq panthA$m | puqShTiqpatI# paSuqpA vAja#bastyau | 21 (10)

iqmAni# haqvyA praya#tA juShAqNA | suqgairnOq yAnaiqrupa#yAtAM ~Myaqj~jam || kShuqdrAn paqSUn ra#kShatu rEqvatI# naH | gAvO# nOq aSvAq(gm)q anvE#tu pUqShA | annaq(gm)q rakSha#ntau bahuqqdhA virU#pam | vAja(gm)# sanutAqM ~Myaja#mAnAya yaqj~jam || tadaqSvinA#-vaSvaqyujOpa#yAtAm | SuBaqM gami#ShThau suqyamE#BiqraSvai$H | svaM nakSha#tra(gm) haqviShAq yaja#ntau | maddhvAq saMpRu#ktauq yaju#ShAq sama#ktau || 22 (10)

yau dEqvAnA$M BiqShajau# havyavAqhau | viSva#sya dUqtA-vaqmRuta#sya gOqpau | tau nakSha#traM jujuShAqNO-pa#yAtAm | namOq&SviByA$M kRuNumO-&SvaqyugByA$m || apa# pAqpmAnaqM Bara#NIrBarantu | tad yaqmO rAjAq Baga#vAqnq. vica#ShTAm | lOqkasyaq rAjA# mahaqtO maqhAn. hi | suqgaM naqH panthAqmaBa#yaM kRuNOtu || yasmiqn nakSha#trE yaqma Etiq rAjA$ | yasmi#-nnEnamaqByaShi#caMnta dEqvAH ( ) | tada#sya ciqtra(gm) haqviShA# yajAma | apa# pAqpmAnaqM Bara#NIr Barantu || "niqvESa#nIq {1}" "yattE# dEqvA ada#dhuH {2}" || 23 (13) (taqtAraq - mahya#M - prAsaqcIryA - yA$ntu yaqj~jaM - ~MvAca(gg)# - svaqsti - dEqvA-anu# yantiq sarvEq-vAja#bastyauq-sama#ktau-dEqvA strINi# ca) (A2) 3.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - cAndramasAdInAM saptanAmiShTInAM yAjyAnuvAkyAH

"navO# navO Bavatiq jAya#mAnOq {3]" "yamA#diqtyA aq(gm)qSumA$pyAqyaya#nti {4}"|| yE virU#pEq sama#nasA saqm~Mvyaya#ntI | saqmAqnaM tantu#M pari tAtaqnAtE$ | viqBU praqBU a#nuqBU viqSvatO# huvE | tE nOq nakSha#trEq havaqmAga#mEtam || vaqyaM dEqvI brahma#NA sam~MvidAqnAH | suqratnA#sO dEqvavI#tiqM dadhA#nAH | aqhOqrAqtrE haqviShA# vaqrddhaya#ntaH | ati# pAqpmAnaq-mati#muktyA gamEma || pratyu#vadRuSyAyaqtI | 24 (10)

vyuqcCantI# duhiqtA diqvaH | aqpO maqhI vRu#NutEq cakShu#ShA || tamOq jyOti#ShkRuNOti sUqnarI$ | uduqstriyA$H sacatEq sUrya#H | sa cA# uqdyannakSha#tra-marciqmat | tavEdu#ShOq vyuShiq sUrya#sya ca || saM BaqktEna# gamEmahi | tannOq nakSha#tra-marciqmat | BAqnuqmattEja# uqccara#t | upa# yaqj~ja-miqhAga#mat || 25 (10)

pra nakSha#trAya dEqvAya# | indrAqyEndu(gm)# havAmahE | sa na#H saviqtA su#vath saqnim | puqShTiqdAM ~MvIqrava#ttamam || "uduqtyaM {5}" "ciqtram {6}"|| "adi#tirna uruShyatu {7}" "maqhImUqShu mAqtara$m {8} || "iqdaM ~MviShNuqH{9}" "pratadviShNu#H {10]" || "aqgnirmUqrddhA {11}" "Buva#H {12}" || "anu# nOq&dyAnu#matiq {13}" "ranvida#numatEq tvam {14}" || "haqvyaqvAhaq(gg)q {15}" "svi#ShTam {16}" ( ) || 26 (10) 3.1.4 anuvAkaM 4 - dEva nakShatrEShTibrAhmaNam

aqgnirvA a#kAmayata | aqnnAqdO dEqvAnA(gg)# syAqmiti# | sa EqtamaqgnayEq kRutti#kAByaH purOqDASa#-maqShTAka#pAlaqM nira#vapat | tatOq vai sO$&nnAqdO dEqvAnA#maBavat | aqgnirvai dEqvAnA#mannAqdaH || yathA# haq vA aqgnir dEqvanA#-mannAqdaH | Eqva(gm) haq vA EqSha ma#nuqShyA#NAM Bavati | ya EqtEna# haqviShAq yaja#tE | ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# || sO&tra# juhOti | aqgnayEq svAhAq kRutti#kAByaqH svAhA$ | aqmbAyaiq svAhA# duqlAyaiq svAhA$ | niqtaqtnyai svAhAq &Braya#ntyaiq svAhA$ | mEqGaya#ntyaiq svAhA# vaqraq.Shaya#ntyaiq svAhA$ | cuqpuqNIkA#yaiq svAhEti# || 27 (15)

praqjApa#tiH praqjA a#sRujata | tA a#smAth sRuqShTAH parA#cIrAyann | tAsA(gm)# rOhiqNI-maqBya#ddhyAyat | sO#&kAmayata | upaq mA&&va#rtEta | samE#nayA gacCEqyEti# | sa EqtaM praqjApa#tayE rOhiqNyai caqruM nira#vapat | tatOq vai sA tamuqpAva#rtata | samE#nayA &gacCata || upa# haq vA E#naM priqyamAva#rtatE | saM priqyENa# gacCatE | ya EqtEna# haqviShAq yaja#tE | ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# || sO&tra# juhOti | praqjApa#tayEq svAhA# rOhiqNyai svAhA$ | rOca#mAnAyaiq svAhA$ praqjAByaqH svAhEti# || 28 (16)

sOmOq vA a#kAmayata | OSha#dhInA(gm) rAqjya-maqBija#yEyaqmiti# | sa Eqta(gm) sOmA#ya mRugaSIqraq.ShAya# SyAmAqkaM caqruM paya#siq nira#vapat | tatOq vai sa OSha#dhInA(gm) rAqjyamaqBya#jayat | saqmAqnAnA(gm)# haq vai rAqjyamaqBija#yati | ya EqtEna# haqviShAq yaja#tE | ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# | sO&tra# juhOti | sOmA#yaq svAhA# mRugaSIqraq.ShAyaq svAhA$ | iqnvaqkAByaqH svAhauSha#dhIByaqH svAhA$ | rAqjyAyaq svAhAq &Biji#tyaiq svAhEti# || 29 (11)

ruqdrO vA a#kAmayata | paqSuqmAnth syAqmiti# | sa Eqta(gm) ruqdrAyAqrdrAyaiq praiya#~ggavaM caqruM paya#siq nira#vapat | tatOq vai sa pa#SuqmAna#Bavat | paqSuqmAn. haq vai Ba#vati | ya EqtEna# haqviShAq yaja#tE | ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# | sO&tra# juhOti | ruqdrAyaq svAhAq &&rdrAyaiq svAhA$ | pinva#mAnAyaiq svAhA# paqSuByaqH svAhEti# || 30 (10)

RuqkShA vA iqyama#lOqmakA#&&sIt | sA&kA#mayata | OSha#dhIBiqr-vanaqspati#BiqH prajA#yEqyEti# | saitamadi#tyaiq puna#rvasuByAM caqruM nira#vapat | tatOq vA iqyamOSha#dhIBiqr-vanaqspati#BiqH prAjA#yata | prajA#yatE haq vai praqjayA# paqSuBi#H | ya EqtEna# haqviShAq yaja#tE | ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# | sO&tra# juhOti | adi#tyaiq svAhAq puna#rvasuByAm | svAhA&&BU$tyaiq svAhAq prajA$tyaiq svAhEti# || 31 (11)

bRuhaqspatiqrvA a#kAmayata | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI syAqmiti# | sa EqtaM bRuhaqspata#yE tiqShyA#ya naivAqraM caqruM paya#siq nira#vapat | tatOq vai sa bra#hmavarcaqsya#Bavat | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI haq vai Ba#vati | ya EqtEna# haqviShAq yaja#tE | ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# | sO&tra# juhOti | bRuhaqspata#yEq svAhA# tiqShyA#yaq svAhA$ | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsAyaq svAhEti# || 32 (10)

dEqvAqsuqrAH sam~Mya#ttA Asann | tE dEqvAH saqrpEBya# ASrEqShAByaq AjyE# karaqmBaM nira#vapann | tAnEqtABi#rEqva dEqvatA#-BiqrupA#nayann | EqtABi#rhaq vai dEqvatA#Bir-dviqShantaqM BrAtRu#vyaq-mupa#nayati | ya EqtEna# haqviShAq yaja#tE | ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# | sO&tra# juhOti | saqrpEByaqH svAhA$&&SrEqShAByaqH svAhA$ | daqndaqSUkE$ByaqH svAhEti# || 33 (9)

- "haqvyaqvAhaq(gg)q {15}" "svi#ShTam {16}" haqvyaqvAha#-maBimAtiqShA&ha$m | raqkShOqhaNaqM pRuta#nAsu jiqShNum | jyOti#ShmantaqM dIdya#taqM pura#ndhim | aqgni(gg) svi#ShTaqkRutaqmA hu#vEma || {15} svi#ShTamagnE aqBi tat pRu#NAhi | viSvA# dEvaq pRuta#nA aqBiShya | uqruM naqH panthA$M pradiqSanvi BA#hi | jyOti#ShmaddhEhyaqjara#M naq Ayu#H || {16}

tRuqtIya#syAmiqtO diqvi sOma# AsIt | taM gA#yaqtryAha#rat | tasya# paqrNama#cCidyata | tat paqrNO#&Bavat | tat paqrNasya# parNaqtvam | brahmaq vai paqrNaH | yat pa#rNaSAqKayA# vaqthsAna#pAkaqrOti# | brahma#NaiqvainA#naqpAka#rOti || gAqyaqtrO vai paqrNaH | gAqyaqtrAH paqSava#H | 1 (10)

tasmAqt trINi#trINi paqrNasya# palAqSAni# | triqpadA# gAyaqtrI | yat pa#rNaSaqKayAq gAH prAqrpaya#ti | svayaiqvainA# dEqvata#yAq prArpa#yati | yaM kAqmayE#tA paqSuH syAqditi# | aqpaqrNAM tasmaiq SuShkA$grAqmAha#rEt | aqpaqSurEqva Ba#vati | yaM kAqmayE#ta paSuqmAnth syAqditi# | baqhuqpaqrNAM tasmai# bahuSAqKAmAha#rEt | paqSuqmanta#-mEqvaina#M karOti || 2 (10)

yat prAcI#mAqharE$t | dEqvaqlOqka-maqBija#yEt | yadudI#cIM manuShyalOqkam | prAcIqmudI#cIqmAha#rati | uqBayO$r lOqkayO#-raqBiji#tyai || iqShE tvOqrjE tvEtyA#ha | iSha#mEqvOrjaqM ~Myaja#mAnE dadhAti || vAqyavaqH sthEtyA#ha | vAqyurvA aqntari#kShaq-syAddhya#kShAH | aqntaqriqkShaqdEqvaqtyA$H Kaluq vai paqSava#H | 3 (10)

vAqyava# EqvainAqn pari# dadAti | pra vA E#nAnEqtadA-ka#rOti | yadAha# | vAqyavaqH sthEtyu#pAqyavaqH sthEtyA#ha | yaja#mAnAyaiqva paqSUnupa#hvayatE || dEqvO va#H saviqtA prArpa#yaqtvityA#haq prasU$tyai || SrEShTha#tamAyaq karma#Naq ityA#ha | yaqj~jO hi SrEShTha#tamaqM karma# | tasmA#dEqvamA#ha || ApyA#yaddhvamaGniyA dEvaBAqgamityA#ha | 4 (10)

vaqthsEBya#Scaq vA EqtAH puqrA ma#nuqShyE$Byaq-ScApyA#yanta | dEqvEBya# EqvainAq indrAqyApyA#yati || Urja#svatIqH paya#svatIqrityA#ha | Urjaq(gm) qhi paya#H saqmBara#nti || praqjAva#tI-ranamIqvA a#yaqkShmA ityA#haq prajA$tyai | mAva#H stEqna I#Sataq mA&GaSa(gm)#saq ityA#haq guptyai$ || ruqdrasya# hEqtiH pari# vO vRuNaqktvityA#ha | ruqdrA dEqvainA$-strAyatE || dhruqvA aqsmin gOpa#tau syAta baqhvIrityA#ha | dhruqvA EqvAsmi#n baqhvIH ka#rOti ( ) || 5 (10)

yaja#mAnasya paqSUn pAqhItyA#ha | paqSuqnAM gO#pIqthAya# | tasmA$thsAqyaM paqSavaq upa# saqmAva#rtantE || ana#dhaH sAdayati | garBA#NAqM dhRutyAq apra#pAdAya | tasmAqdgarBA$H praqjAnAqmapra#pAdukAH | uqparI#vaq nida#dhAti | uqparI#vaq hi su#vaqrgO lOqkaH | suqvaqrgasya# lOqkasyaq sama#ShTyai || 6 (9) 3.2.2 anuvAkaM 2 - barhirAharaNam

dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqva itya#Svapaqrq.SumAda#ttEq prasU$tyai | aqSvinO$r-bAqhuByAqmityA#ha | aqSvinauq hi dEqvAnA#maddhvaqryU AstA$m | pUqShNO hastA$ByAqmityA#haq yatyai$ || yO vA OSha#dhIH parvaqSO vEda# | nainAqH sa hi#nasti | praqjApa#tiqrvA OSha#dhIH parvaqSO vE#da | sa E#nAq na hi#nasti | aqSvaqpaqrSvA baqrq.hiracCai#ti | prAqjAqpaqtyO vA aSva#H sayOniqtvAya# | 7 (10)

OSha#dhInAqmahi(gm)#sAyai || yaqj~jasya# GOqShadaqsItyA#ha | yaja#mAna Eqva raqyiM da#dhAti | pratyu#ShTaq(gm)q rakShaqH pratyu#ShTAq arA#tayaq ityA#ha | rakSha#sAq-mapa#hatyai || prEyama#gAddhiqShaNA# baqrq.hiracCEtyA#ha | viqdyA vai dhiqShaNA$ | viqdyayaiqvainaqdacCai#ti || manu#nA kRuqtA svaqdhayAq vitaqShTEtyA#ha | mAqnaqvI hi par.Su#H svaqdhAkRu#tA | 8 (10)

ta Ava#hanti kaqvaya#H puqrastAqdityA#ha | SuqSruqvA(gm)sOq vai kaqvaya#H | yaqj~jaH puqrastA$t | muqKaqta Eqva yaqj~jamAra#BatE | athOq yadEqtaduqktvA yataqH kuta#ScAqhara#ti | tat prAcyA# Eqva diqSO Ba#vati || dEqvEByOq juShTa#miqha baqrq.hirAqsadaq ityA#ha | baqrq.hiShaqH samRu#ddhyai | karmaqNO&na#parAdhAya || dEqvAnA$M pariShUqtamaqsItyA#ha | 9 (10)

yadvA iqdaM kiM ca# | tad-dEqvAnA$M pariShUqtam | athOq yathAq vasya#sE pratiq prOcyAhEqdaM ka#riShyAqmIti# | EqvamEqva tada#ddhvaqryur-dEqvEBya#H pratiq prOcya# baqrq.hirdA#ti | AqtmanO&hi(gm)#sAyai || yAva#taH staqmbAn pa#ri diqSEt | yattEShA#-mucCiq(gg)qShyAt | atiq tad-yaqj~jasya# rEcayEt | Eka(gg)# staqmbaM pari#diSEt | ta(gm) sarva#M dAyAt | 10 (10)

yaqj~jasyAna#tirEkAya || vaqrq.ShavRu#ddha-maqsItyA#ha | vaqrq.Sha vRu#ddhAq vA OSha#dhayaH || dEva# bar.hiqrityA#ha | dEqvEBya# Eqvaina#t karOti | mA tvAq&nva~gmA tiqryagityAqhA hi(gm)#sAyai | parva# tE rAddhyAsaqmityAq-harddhyai$ || AqcCEqttA tEq mA ri#ShaqmityA#ha | nAsyAqtmanO# mIyatE | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || 11 (10)

dEva#bar.hiH Saqtava#l.SaqM ~MvirOqhEtyA#ha | praqjA vai baqrq.hiH | praqjAnA$M praqjana#nAya || saqhasra#val.SAq vi vaqya(gm) ru#hEqmEtyA#ha | AqSiSha#mEqvaitAmASA$stE || pRuqthiqvyAH saqpRuMca#H pAqhItyA#haq prati#ShThityai || ayu#~ggAyu~ggAn-muqShTIn ~Mlu#nOti | miqthuqnaqtvAyaq prajA$tyai || suqsaqBRuMtA$ tvAq saMBa#rAqmItyA#ha | brahma#Naiqvainaqth- saMBa#rati || 12 (10)

adi#tyaiq rAsnAq&sItyA#ha | iqyaM ~MvA adi#tiH | aqsyA Eqvainaqd-rAsnA$M karOti || iqndrAqNyai saqnaMha#naqmityA#ha | iqndrAqNI vA agrE# dEqvatA#nAq(gm)q sama#nahyata | sA &&rddhnO$t | Ruddhyaiq saMna#hyati | praqjA vai baqrq.hiH | praqjAnAqmapa#rAvApAya | tasmAqth-snAva#saMtatAH praqjA jA#yantE || 13 (10)

pUqShA tE$ graqnthiM gra#thnAqtvityA#ha | puShTi#mEqva yaja#mAnE dadhAti || sa tEq mA&& sthAqdityAqhAhi(gm)#sAyai || paqScAt prA~jcaqmupa#gUhati | paqScAd vai prAqcInaq(gm)q rEtO# dhIyatE | paqScAdEqvAsmai$ prAqcInaq(gm)q rEtO# dadhAti || indra#sya tvA bAqhuByAq-mudya#cCaq ityA#ha | iqndriqyamEqva yaja#mAnE dadhAti || bRuhaqspatE$rmUqrddhnA ha#rAqmItyA#ha | brahmaq vai dEqvAnAqM bRuhaqspati#H | 14 (10)

brahma#Naiqvaina#ddharati || uqrva#ntari#kShaq-manviqhItyA#haq gatyai$ || dEqvaqgaMqmamaqsItyA#ha | dEqvAnEqvaina#dgamayati || ana#dhaH sAdayati | garBA#NAqM dhRutyAq apra#pAdAya | tasmAqd-garBA$H praqjAnAqmapra#pAdukAH | uqparI#vaq nida#dhAti | uqparI#vaq hi su#vaqrgO lOqkaH | suqvaqrgasya# lOqkasyaq sama#ShTyai ( ) || 15 (10) 3.2.3 anuvAkaM 3 - dOhanam

pUqrvEqdyuriqddhmA baqrq.hiH ka#rOti | yaqj~jamEqvAraBya# gRuhIqtvOpa#vasati || praqjApa#tir yaqj~jama#sRujata | tasyOqKE a#sra(gm)sEtAm | yaqj~jO vai praqjApa#tiH | yath sA$nnAyyOqKE Bava#taH | yaqj~jasyaiqva taduqKE upa#dadhAqtya-pra#sra(gm)sAya || Sundha#ddhvaqM daivyA#yaq karma#NE dEvayaqjyAyAq ityA#ha | dEqvaqyaqjyAyA# EqvainA#ni Sundhati || mAqtaqriSva#nO GaqrmO#&sItyA#ha | 16 (10)

aqntari#kShaqM ~Mvai mA#taqriSva#nO GaqrmaH | EqShAM ~MlOqkAnAqM ~MvidhRu#tyai || dyaura#si pRuthiqvya#sItyA#ha | diqvaScaq hyE#ShA pRu#thiqvyAScaq saMBRu#tA | yaduqKA | tasmA#dEqvamA#ha || viqSvadhA#yA asi paraqmENaq dhAmnEtyA#ha | vRuShTiqrvai viqSvadhA#yAH | vRuShTi#mEqvAva#rundhE | dRu(gm)ha#svaq mA hvAqrityA#haq dhRutyai$ || 17 (10)

vasU#nAM paqvitra#maqsItyA#ha | prAqNA vai vasa#vaH | tEShAqM ~MvA Eqtad-BA#gaqdhEya$m | yat paqvitra$m | tEBya# Eqvaina#t karOti || SaqtadhA#ra(gm) saqhasra#dhAraqmityA#ha | prAqNEShvEqvAyu#r-dadhAti sarvaqtvAya# || triqvRut pa#lASaSAqKAyA$M darBaqmaya#M Bavati | triqvRudvai prAqNaH | triqvRuta#mEqva prAqNaM ma#ddhyaqtO yaja#mAnE dadhAti | 18 (10)

sauqmyaH paqrNaH sa#yOniqtvAya# | sAqkShAt paqvitra#M daqrBAH | prAKsAqyamadhiq nida#dhAti | tat prA#NApAqnayO# rUqpam | tiqryakprAqtaH | tad-dar.Sa#sya rUqpam | dAqrSya(gg) hyE#tadaha#H | annaqM ~Mvai caqndramA$H | anna#M prAqNAH | uqBaya#mEqvOpaiqtyajA#mitvAya | 19 (10)

tasmA#daqya(gm) saqrvata#H pavatE || huqtaH stOqkO huqtO draqPsa ityA#haq prati#ShThityai | haqviShO&ska#ndAya | na hi huqta(gg) svAhA#kRutaq(gg)q skanda#ti | diqvi nAkOq nAmAqgniH | tasya# viqpruShO# BAgaqdhEya$m | aqgnayE# bRuhaqtE nAkAqyEtyA#ha | nAka#mEqvAgniM BA#gaqdhEyE#naq sama#rddhayati | svAhAq dyAvA#pRuthiqvIByAqmityA#ha | dyAvA#pRuthiqvyOrEqvainaqt-prati#ShThApayati | 20 (10)

paqvitra#vaqtyAna#yati | aqpAM caiqvauSha#dhInAM caq rasaq(gm)q sa(gm)sRu#jati | athOq OSha#dhIShvEqva paqSUn prati#ShThApayati || aqnvAqraByaq vAca#M ~MyacCati | yaqj~jasyaq dhRutyai$ | dhAqraya#nnAstE | dhAqraya#nta ivaq hi duqhanti# | kAma#dhukShaq ityAqhAtRuqtIya#syai | traya# iqmE lOqkAH | iqmAnEqva lOqkAn. yaja#mAnO duhE | 21 (10)

aqmUmitiq nAma# gRuhNAti | BaqdramEqvAsAqM karmAqviShka#rOti || sA viqSvAyuqH sA viqSvavya#cAqH sA viqSvakaqrmEtyA#ha | iqyaM ~Mvai viqSvAyu#H | aqntari#kShaM ~MviqSvavya#cAH | aqsau viqSvaka#rmA | iqmAnEqvaitABi#rlOqkAn. ya#thApUqrvaM du#hE | athOq yathA$ pradAqtrE puNya#mAqSAstE$ | EqvamEqvainA# Eqtadupa#stauti | tasmAqt-prAdAqdityuqnnIyaq vanda#mAnA upastuqvanta#H paqSUn du#hanti | 22 (10)

- ApO# BaqdrA{33} Aditpa#SyAmi{34} ApO# BaqdrA GRuqtamidApa# AsuraqgnI-ShOmau# biBraqtyApaq it tAH | tIqvrO rasO# madhuqpRucA# maraMgaqma A mA$ prAqNEna# saqha varca#sA gann || {33} Adit pa#SyAmyuqta vA# SRuNOqmyA mAq GOShO# gacCatiq vA~gna# AsAM | manyE# BEjAqnO aqmRuta#syaq tar.hiq hira#NyavarNAq atRu#paM ~MyaqdA va#H || {34} (BOth {33} and {34} appEaring in T.S.5.6.1.3 and 5.6.1.4) -------------------------------------------------------------

- tuBya#M Barantiq{35] yO dEqhyaH{36} tuBya#M Baranti kShiqtayO# yaviShTha | baqlima#gnEq anti# taq Ota dUqrAt | A Bandi#ShThasya sumaqtiM ci#kiddhi | bRuqhattE# agnEq mahiq Sarma# Baqdram || {35} yO dEqhyO ana#mayadvadhaqsnaiH | yO arya#patnI-ruqShasa#ScaqkAra# | sa niqrudhyAq nahu#ShO yaqhvO aqgniH | viSa#ScakrE baliqhRutaqH sahO#BiH || {36}

- pUrva#M dEvAq apa#rENa{37} prANApAqnau{38} pUrva#M dEvAq apa#rENA-nuqpaSyaq~jjanma#BiH | janmAqnyava#raiqH parA#Ni | vEdA#ni dEvA aqyamaqsmItiq mAm | aqha(gm) hiqtvA SarI#raM jaqrasa#H paqrastA$t || {37} prAqNAqpAqnau cakShuqH SrOtra$m | vAcaqM mana#siq saMBRu#tAm | hiqtvA SarI#raM jaqrasa#H paqrastA$t | A BUtiqM BUti#M ~Mvaqyama#SnavAmahai || {38}

- haqvyaqvAhaqq{39} svi#ShTaM{40} haqvyaqvAha#-maBimAtiqShA&ha$m | raqkShOqhaNaqM pRuta#nAsu jiqShNum | jyOti#ShmantaqM dIdya#taqM pura#ndhim | aqgni(gg) svi#ShTaqkRutaqmA hu#vEma || {39} svi#ShTamagnE aqBi tat pRu#NAhi | viSvA# dEvaq pRuta#nA aqBiShya | uqruM naqH panthA$M pradiqSanvi BA#hi | jyOti#ShmaddhEhyaqjara#M naq Ayu#H || {40}

- aqgni rmUqrdhA{41} Buva#H{42} aqgnirmUqrdhA diqvaH kaqkut pati#H pRuthiqvyA aqyaM | aqpA(gm) rEtA(gm)#si jinvati || {41} BuvO# yaqj~jasyaq raja#saSca nEqtA yatrA# niqyudBiqH saca#sE SiqvABi#H | diqvi mUqrdhAna#M dadhiShE suvaqrq.ShAM jiqhvAma#gnE cakRuShE havyaqvAha$M || {42} (BOth {41} and {42} appEaring in T.S.4.4.4.1) -------------------------------------------------------------
